verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> when he <S%H1272>fled<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> are they <S%H7231>increased<s%> that <S%H6862>trouble<s%> me! <S%H7227>many<s%> are they that rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me.
Many <S%H7227><s%> there be which <S%H559>say<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> There is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3444>help<s%> for him in <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
But <S%H859>thou,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> art a <S%H4043>shield<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> me; my <S%H3519>glory,<s%> and the lifter <S%H7311>up<s%> of mine <S%H7218>head.<s%>
I <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and he <S%H6030>heard<s%> me out of his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4480>hill.<s%> <S%H2022><s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
I <S%H589><s%> laid me <S%H7901>down<s%> and <S%H3462>slept;<s%> I <S%H6974>awaked;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5564>sustained<s%> me.

I will <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of ten <S%H4480>thousands<s%> <S%H7233><s%> of <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> have <S%H7896>set<s%> themselves <S%H5921>against<s%> me round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> me, O my <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou hast <S%H5221>smitten<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> upon the cheek <S%H3895>bone;<s%> thou hast <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of the <S%H7563>ungodly.<s%>
Salvation <S%H3444><s%> belongeth unto the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> thy <S%H1293>blessing<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
